import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/Register.css' const Register = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', userName: '', password: '', birth: '', role: '' }) const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('') const [passwordError, setPasswordError] = useState(false) const [emailError, setEmailError] = useState(false) const [usernameError, setUsernameError] = useState(false) const handleUser = (key, value) => { let updated = {...user} updated[key] = value setUser(updated) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Formulario de registro

handleUser('firstName', e.target.value)} />
handleUser('lastName', e.target.value)} />
handleUser('email', e.target.value)} /> {emailError ?

El correo electrónico ya está en uso

: <> }
handleUser('userName', e.target.value)} /> {usernameError ?

El nombre de usuario ya está en uso

: <> }
handleUser('password', e.target.value)} />
setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)} /> {passwordError ?

Las contraseñas no coinciden

: <> }
handleUser('birth', e.target.value)} />
) } export default Register
